info.desc: Mark up a key to be pressed on the user's keyboard.

item.p: The style attribute takes a space-seperated list of style hints. Processing tools should adjust their rendering according to those style hints they understand.
The key element can link to other pages or documents. See for more information.
The key element can have attributes from external namespaces. See for more information on external-namespace attributes on inline elements.

section.title: Comparison to DocBook
section.p: The key element is similar to the keycap element in DocBook. Mallard does not provide elements analogous to the DocBook elements keysym and keycode. In most cases, these should be marked simply with the sys element.
